title: 114_hr4330
content: The Act titled "Improving Contract Procurement for Small Businesses through More Accurate Reporting Act of 2016" requires certain small business concerns to meet reporting requirements. Section 15(h)(2)(E) of the Small Business Act is amended to include new subclauses regarding small business concerns that were purchased by another entity after the initial contract was awarded and those awarded using a procurement method that restricted competition to small business concerns.
